matches.label: Matches

matches.contactInfo: {hisHer} will be available in 30 minutes before meeting

contactInfo.description: Your contact info will be shown to your match 30 minutes before meeting with you to have ability to contact with you

contactUs.description: If you have any suggestions - feel free to contact us

states.noVideos: Answer at least one question below to have your mmeet-video

info.title: What is mmeet-video?
info.description:
As soon as you answer any questions on previous screen - videos of them will be merged into one, mmeet-video.

mmeet video will be shown to your matches and vice versa after you and your match will like photo likes

deleteAnswer.title: Delete answer
deleteAnswer.description: Are you sure you want to delete this answer?

inviteFriend.title: Invite Friend
inviteFriend.description: Invite your friend. Ask questions and record them. When your friend will register, mmeet-video will be already there.
inviteFriend.subText: * when you click next - your friend will be registered and you wont be able to invite this email again

questions.title: Questions
questions.description: Ask your friend {inviteUserEmail} to answer questions below and record them on your device. mmeet-video will wait after friend's registration

info.description:
Invited friends statistics show the friends you have invited and their statistics.

This section can be seen as showing the chain of events of which you are the author. People meet, you helped it.
